message: %s must drink.
%s must drink.
%s must drink.
%s hands out 2 sips.
%s hands out 2 sips.
%s hands out 2 sips.
%s, drink 3 times.
%s, drink 3 times.
Cian Farry, down your drink.
%s and %s pour a shot of your drink into a glass, mix it, and each of you drink half.
Last person to touch the floor drinks.
Last person to touch %s drinks.
Last person to touch %s drinks.
Anyone who has eaten during this game must drink.
If your drink is mixed then take a drink.
Brown eyed players drink.
Blue eyed players drink.
Green eyed players drink.
Players with dyed hair drink.
%s chooses a category. Go around the room naming this something from this category. First person to repeat or not think of one must drink.
%s bust a rhyme. Go around the room rhyming with this word. First person to repeat or not think of one must drink.
Play a round of "Never Have I ever". %s starts. Drink each time you have done what was said.
Play a round of "Ever Have I ever". %s starts. Drink each time you have NOT done what was said.
%s creates a rule. Anyone who breaks this rule during the rest of the game must drink
Everyone point at who the most sober player is. They must down their drink.
%s, tell a joke. If no one laughs, you must drink. If anyone laughs, everyone must drink.
Everyone thank Paul for making such a mind-bogglingly poggers app. Last person to do this drinks.
The player showing the most skin must drink.
The player wearing the most items of clothing must drink
Any player who has spilt a drink tonight must drink.
%s, take off a piece of clothing, or drink
%s, take off a piece of clothing, or drink
If %s owns a car they take 2 sips, otherwise hand them out
%s and %s must swap an item of clothing. %s decides which item. If anyone refuses, they all drink.
Oldest in the group drinks
Youngest in the group drinks
%s, tell us when you last has sex, or drink
%s, tell us the last person you kissed, or drink
%s, tell us the last person you kissed, or drink
If %s has 'done stuff' with anyone in the room, they both drink
Last person to have taken a shit gives out 3 sips
%s, moan %s's name or take a drink
If %s is single (or their partner isn't here), all the single people waterfall. If they are taken, they must do a body shot off their partner.
Waterfall! Start with %s and go clockwise.
Everyone take a drink.
If you are drinking beer, take a drink.
The person with the biggest shoe size drinks.
Anyone drinking vodka must drink.
Anyone drinking wine must drink.
%s Heads or tails. If they get it right they give out two sips, otherwise they must drink the two sips.
%s, play Fuck, Marry, Kill with the other people in the room. Anyone selected takes a drink.
Drink if you've ever had a sexual thought about %s.
If %s has had Covid-19 drink 2 sips, else give out 3 sips.
%s drinks 2 sips if you are playing this in your house. Give them out if you are not.
Take a drink for every sibling you have.
Drink for 1 second for every 1st cousin you have.
%s, sing the verse of a song, or drink 3 times.
Take a drink if you are wearing a hat.
%s, what is %s's date of birth? Drink once if you get either the day, month or year wrong. Give out a sip for each of these you get right.
The next player who leaves the room must finish their drink before doing so.
%s play 2 Truths 1 Lie. Everyone else must guess the lie. Every player who guesses wrong must drink. You must drink for every correct guess.
%s, you have been hit on by %s. What is your reaction? Both of you must drink.
%s, say "Most Likely to ..." Everyone points at a player. Everyone drink once per person that pointed at you.
Everyone vote the most likely to get pregnant or get someone pregnant. Everyone point at a player. Everyone drink once per person that pointed at you.
Anyone who has ever kissed %s must drink.
The player who has known %s the longest must drink.
Anyone who has taken a photo tonight must drink.
Anyone carrying a condom must drink.
The next player to check their phone (not including for using playing this game) must down their drink.
The last person to stand up must drink.
%s, lip sync to a song, or drink. Others may rank the performance out of 5, give out as many sips as points you got out of 5
%s, impersonate a celebrity or take a sip, first person to guess the celebrity may hand out a sip
